Address.label: Address
Address.value: 14 PAR-LA-VILLE ROAD,PAR-LA-VILLE PLACE, P.O. BOX HM 1593, HAMILTON, HM 08, Bermuda

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Frontline Ltd is a shipping company engaged in the seaborne transportation of crude oil and oil products. Group operates through the tankers segment. The tankers segment includes crude oil tankers and product tankers. Its geographical area of operation includes Arabian Gulf, West African, the North Sea, and the Caribbean. Frontline earns revenue through voyage charters, time charters, and a finance lease. It is also involved in the charter, purchase, and sale of vessels.
